scripts.say: I thought the labyrinth had only gotten bigger, but somebody's added new traps and ambush areas. What was originally the safe way through has become littered with traps...
And it's all made from the ocean... If only we could simply swim beneath it. Go down where it's wetter, down where it's better.
Whoever remodeled the labyrinth must be familiar with how it was originally like...
That leaves few candidates as to who it might be.
A clone of Mio, I suppose... Would make sense if she was the keeper of this place.
But if someone went through all the trouble of changing the labyrinth, that might mean we're on the right track.
If the key to solving the mystery of the Mirror Sea really does lie in here, then the enemy must be ready to protect it fiercely. Stay on your guards.
You got it. I'm pumped up and ready to take on this chump of a pawn!
Don't tempt fate with one-liners like that, Mio...
